span.span: if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法并不表示该元素是否可见。This method does not indicate whether the element is visible. 在某些情况下，元素可以在屏幕上，但仍不可见 （例如遮盖其他元素的元素）。In some circumstances, the element can be on the screen but still not be visible (for example, an element that is obscured by other elements).
